properties.dcterms:title: Yaskawa Motoman Renewable Energy Assembly Dataset
properties.dcterms:description: Comprehensive dataset containing technical specifications, performance metrics, and operational parameters for Yaskawa Motoman industrial robots deployed in renewable energy assembly applications, including solar panel manufacturing and wind turbine component assembly.

properties.dcat:endpointDescription: Yaskawa Motoman renewable energy assembly dataset API endpoint providing access to robotic operation logs and performance metrics
properties.dprod:dataProductOwner: Renewable Energy Automation Division - Yaskawa Motoman
